name: Hyper Tower
description:
Create huge towers of varied 3d pieces and prevent them from falling.
Put the pieces precisely and create a perfect tower.

Features:
You have pieces of different shapes and sizes: cubes, spheres, wedges, vehicles ...
Free arcade type game without end
Hundreds of levels
Height of towers without limit
Game based on realistic physics, some pieces bounce or jump.
Simple one-touch operation: while you touch the screen, the piece moves to the right or left.
The game ends when the tower collapses or when some piece goes off the board
